TopicTitle: Right mouse button doesn't work as it should

Articles.Content:
OK, so I'm in 1.1.2 and the right mouse button doesn't work too well. When I try to rotate the camera it just cuts out and I have to click many many times to rotate it.

RMB works fine on desktop. I can hold it and create those blue windows "squares", or whatever they're called.

I have found this happens in the VAB or SPH when you have parts that are not attached to anything. 

Other than that are you using a wireless mouse or perhaps the game is stuttering?
The game is not stuttering and yes, I use a wireless mouse. It seems to happen everywhere (KSC scene, SPH/VAB, flight).
Perhaps your batteries are low? Try replacing them and see if the problem persists.

Hmmm. Might be it, but that would be rather unusual because it works fine when I hold the RMB on desktop.

Will change the batteries and bump this thread tomorrow if the problem persists.
It was the mouse causing problems.
